channel.title: Snippets Vs Server Tutorials?
channel.description:
I think snippets and server tutorials should be 2 different sections not a stickey under server tutorials.
Its hard to keep a sticky clean without spam, and its hard to find what you need.
So why not just make a section for snippets?
Comments are welcomed. Flame is not.

item.title: Snippets Vs Server Tutorials?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Repost it in the site suggestions sticky buddy.

Read full topic
